Room.Name: The Bottom of the Rainbow
Room.Description: You are standing before a shimmering rainbow arching high up into the sky. You feel somehow separated from the natural world, even though the temple spire is only a few meters below you.

Exit.Description: The rainbow extends above you, fading out of existence only meters away.
You can see the Temple of Midgaard below you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie description.

Room.Name: On the Rainbow
Room.Description: You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured light. Through the bottom of the rainbow you can barely make out the Temple of Midgaard, which is now quite far away.

Exit.Description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.
The rainbow extends below you towards Midgaard.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie description.

Room.Name: On the Rainbow
Room.Description: You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured light. Through the bottom of the rainbow you see the City of Midgaard and the land surrounding it. It seems to be miles below you.

Exit.Description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.
The rainbow extends below you towards the land you once knew as home.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie description.

Room.Name: On the Rainbow
Room.Description: You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured light. The rainbow extends above and below you as far as you can see.

Exit.Description: The rainbow extends far above you. You see a glowing white light at the rainbow's end.
The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rainbow brightly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie any description.

Room.Name: On the Rainbow
Room.Description: You are nearing the end of the rainbow. The beams of multicoloured light have begun to merge and solidify. All around you you see glowing starlike motes of dust. Ahead of you is a bridge.

Exit.Description: The rainbow extends above you, merging into a brilliant glowing bridge.
The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

ExtraDescription.Description: The colors of the rainbow seem to converge into a glowing bridge that leads to a massive white gate.
The star-like motes dance before your eyes. They are incredibly beautiful yet intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
The rainbow brilliantly glows with beams of blinding light, in colours that sweep together and merge before your eyes.

Room.Name: The Glowing Bridge at the Rainbow's End
Room.Description: After a long climb you have reached the end of the rainbow. The brilliant colours have twisted and merged into a beautiful glowing bridge that leads toward a massive white gate to the north. All around you is a soft, peaceful glow interrupted only by the passing of starlike dust motes before your eyes.

Exit.Description: The bridge leads on to a massive white gate. You see a large grey figure standing there.
The bridge disassociates into a beautiful spectrum of colours that drop out of sight below you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The gate towers tens of feet above your heads. Beyond it is a field of utter blackness, from which the motes of light seem to issue forth.
The bridge glows with an unearthly light.
The star-like motes dance before your eyes. They are incredibly beautiful yet intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
The rainbow seems to be forming directly from the light of the bridge. It drops out of sight below you.

Room.Name: The Astral Gate
Room.Description: Here the bridge ends before a massive, pearly-coloured gate beyond which you can see a field of blackness filled with silvery snake-like tendrils, stars, and occasional flashes of of light.

Exit.Description: Through the gate you see a massive field of blackness that extends as far as you can see.
The bridge extends towards the rainbow, which drops out of sight below you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The plaque reads: Let this gate stand to protect mortal man for all time against the perils of the outer planes of existence and the creatures fair and foul that dwell within. (The Astral Plane and Githyanki Keep were written by Andersen.)

You see a huge, glowing gate wrought from an incredibly hard translucent material. Each of the intricately carved bars of this mighty gate are about as thick as a man's wrist, rising from the floor to a height of forty feet. A plaque is inset into the wall next to one side of the gate.

Room.Name: Into the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You step through the gate, and into another reality... You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is very disorienting, although it is not too late to return through the gate to the south.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral gate leads back to your world.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

ExtraDescription.Description: >From here the pearly-coloured gate seems very small and insubstantial. Through its bars you can see the Astral Guardian, protecting your world from the perils of this plane of existence.

Room.Name: Exploring the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your bearings and sense of direction.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

Room.Name: Exploring the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your bearings and sense of direction.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Room.Name: Roaming the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is somewhat disorienting. All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.

Room.Name: Roaming the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is somewhat disorienting, though your instincts say you are close to home. All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

Room.Name: Wandering the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is highly disorienting. Nearby you see a large silvery strand of light. Most exits lead off into the astral field.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
You see a tangible strand of silvery light.

Room.Name: Traversing the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust. The weightlessness of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble keeping your sense of direction. All exits lead off into the astral field.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into the depths.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into infinity.
The astral field leads off into the depths.

Room.Name: Walking the Silvery Strand
Room.Description: You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns through the astral field.

Exit.Description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.
You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

Room.Name: Walking the Silvery Strand
Room.Description: You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns through the astral field.

Exit.Description: You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.
The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.

Room.Name: Walking the Silvery Strand
Room.Description: You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns through the astral field.

Exit.Description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.
You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

Room.Description: You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns through the astral field.

Exit.Description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.

Exit.Description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.
You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

Room.Name: Walking the Silvery Strand
Room.Description: You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns through the astral field.

Exit.Description: You see the endless expanse of the astral field.
You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

Room.Name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You have travelled deep inside the astral field. Here the fabric of the field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of existence. Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been warped and twisted into portals to other worlds. Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
Through the nexial link you can see a stony keep.
The astral field leads on into infinity.

Room.Name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
Room.Description: You have travelled deep inside the astral field. Here the fabric of the field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of existence. Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been warped and twisted into portals to other worlds. Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads on into infinity.

Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been warped and twisted into portals to other worlds. Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

Exit.Description: The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into the depths.
The astral field leads on into infinity.

Room.Name: Inside the Githyanki Keep
Room.Description: You are standing just inside a nexial portal that leads out onto the Astral Plane. It seems that you have found the lair of the Githyanki, the once-human followers of Lord Gith. Ahead of you stands a steel door leading into the keep hewn from stone.

Exit.Description: You see a rusty steel door which leads into the keep.
Below you is the nexial portal that leads into the astral plane.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

Room.Name: A guard station
Room.Description: This is a small building just inside the keep. Doors lead out to the east and west. Some small weapons hang on hooks on the walls, for use in defense of the keep. Doors stand in all directions save north.

Exit.Description: You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.
You see a rusty steel door which leads out to the nexial link.
You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road turns to the north, ending to the east at an iron door.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall of the keep.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road continues to the north and south. Doors to the east and west lead into stone buildings.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
You see a small stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.
The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road turns to the south and continues on to the east.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road continues to the east and west. To the north you see a massive building and a pair of large doors.

Exit.Description: Looming before you is a forbidding pair of metal doors.
The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost slippery to the touch. They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road continues to the east and west. A door to the south leads into a tall stone building.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road turns to the west and continues to the south. A door to the north leads into a tall stone building.

Exit.Description: You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road continues to the north and south. To the east is a door in a large stone building.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
The grey cobblestones continue.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road turns to the north and continues on to the west. To the east is a door in a large stone building.

Exit.Description: The grey cobblestones continue.
An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.
The grey cobblestones continue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

Room.Name: A grey road
Room.Description: The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone. A dull red sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city. The cobblestone road goes on to the east, ending to the west at an iron door. A door to the north leads into a small stone building.

Exit.Description: You see a small stone building with a wooden door.
The grey cobblestones continue.
You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall of the keep.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A small building
Room.Description: You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as living quarters for several githyanki gish. The walls are heavy stone blocks, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood. A couple of candles burn dimly in sconces here and there.

Exit.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A small building
Room.Description: You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as living quarters for several githyanki gish. The walls are heavy stone blocks, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood. A couple of candles burn dimly in sconces here and there.

Exit.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: A large dwelling
Room.Description: You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high windows. The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood. On the floor are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

Exit.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: The Githyanki Weaponry
Room.Description: A large chamber, full of weapons in various states of completion. Strange glowing blocks of silvery metal are being pounded and rolled out into deadly razor-sharp knives, daggers, and swords. Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open doorway to the north. An iron door stands to the west.

Exit.Description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.
The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

Room.Name: The Forge
Room.Description: In the center of the room is a massive furnace which emits great gouts of heat and a strange smell which comes from the melting of the silvery metal used by the githyanki. A large trough of icy water stands to the west, used for quenching hot metal. Doorways stand to the north and south. The furnace door lies to the east.

Exit.Description: You see the armoury.
Through the grille in the furnace door you see only flames.
You see the weaponry.

ExtraDescription.Description: The entire furnace is glowing white-hot to the touch. The furnace door looks too hot to even attempt to open.

Room.Name: The Githyanki Armoury
Room.Description: A large chamber, full of suits of armor in various states of completion. In this chamber the hard steels of the githyanki are shaped into ornately fashioned suits of mail. Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open doorway to the south. An iron door stands to the west.

Exit.Description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.
The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

Room.Name: Inside the furnace
Room.Description: You gasp for breath and choke on toxic sulphur and brimstone. The sweat on your forehead is instantly vaporized by the flames that surround you. You begin to feel faint and dizzy from the heat... ... you'd better leave before you pass out and burn to a cinder!

Exit.Description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.
The flames blind you and obscure your vision.
The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

Room.Name: A guard station
Room.Description: You are standing in a small, fairly empty building that serves as the prison for the keep. The building is small because the githyanki do not make a habit of taking prisoners, and those that they do capture do not last long. The cellblock lies to the west and the grey stone road is to the east.

Exit.Description: You see an iron door which leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.
You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.

Room.Name: The cellblock
Room.Description: A torch flickers in the western wall, providing some illumination for this dim corridor. Some whips, manacles, and chains hang on the walls -- they seem to have been used recently. Cell doors stand to the north and south. The guard station is to the east.

Exit.Description: You see a small cell.
You see the guard station.
You see a small cell.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass food underneath to the prisoner.

Room.Name: A cramped cell
Room.Description: You are in a tiny, cold, dank cell. The only exit is back through the door to the south.

Exit.Description: You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass food underneath to the prisoner.

Room.Name: A tiny cell
Room.Description: You are in a cold, dank, cramped cell. The only exit is back through the door to the north.

Exit.Description: You see the cellblock.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass food underneath to the prisoner.

Room.Name: A large dwelling
Room.Description: You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high windows. The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood. On the floor are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

Exit.Description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

Room.Name: South End of the Hall
Room.Description: This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls. Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange silvery metal. The great hall continues to the north and ends in a pair of huge metal doors to the south.

Exit.Description: The great hall continues to the north.
The metal doors lead out onto the grey cobblestone road.

ExtraDescription.Description: The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost slippery to the touch. They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

Room.Name: North End of the Hall
Room.Description: This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls. Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange silvery metal. The great hall continues to the south. An archway leads into a dimly lit room to the north.

Exit.Description: You think you can see some steps leading up to an altar...
The great hall continues to the south.

ExtraDescription.Description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

Room.Name: The Altar Chamber
Room.Description: Your eyes have trouble adjusting to the dim lighting. All around you are columnar statues of githyanki turned towards the altar standing at the top of a series of steps.

Exit.Description: The steps lead north and up to a massive sacrificial altar.
You think you can see the hall.

ExtraDescription.Description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.

Room.Name: Before the Altar
Room.Description: You have climbed the mighty steps of the altar chamber and stand before a huge altar use to pay tribute to Lord Gish, long-dead ruler of the githyanki. The altar is covered in blood and radiates unspeakable power that is absorbed by the horrible presence which stands before you.

Exit.Description: The steps lie to the south, leading back down to the altar chamber floor.
The floor of the altar is pockmarked with small holes, draining blood.

ExtraDescription.Description: The holes have passed countless amounts of blood down below the altar.
The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.
The altar is a huge sacrificial altar covered in bloodstains.

Room.Name: A Gateway to the Underworld
Room.Description: You step through the tiny hole in the altar, and stand before a swirling field of blackness. Through the field you can hear the howls of lost souls and long-dead beings.

Exit.Description: You see the altar chamber.
You look down into the field of blackness, and feel a tangible wave of evil wash over you. Stepping into the field would be a bad idea.

ExtraDescription.Description: The field pulses and feeds on the blood dripping from above. A tangible wave of hatred washes over you, striking fear into your very soul.
The blood drips from above your head and falls through the field...

Room.Name: Utter darkness and despair
Room.Description: It is pitch black... You are overwhelmed by the sensation of death and horrible pain as a shape begins to coalesce before you.

NPC.name: astral guardian
NPC.description: You see a slate grey vaguely humanoid shape, devoid of any true features. It stands before you with arms folded, seemingly uninterested in you.
NPC.longDescription: A grey figure guards the entrance to the astral plane.

NPC.name: nightmare
NPC.description: The nightmare is a wholly evil being, sent out by the rulers of the lower planes to torment mortals. It vaguely resembles a horse, with a hide blacker than the darkest night, and hooves that burn with unholy fires.
NPC.longDescription: A nightmare is here, kicking at you with its flaming hooves.

NPC.name: night hag
NPC.description: You see a shadowy creature with long talons and an evil grin, whose sole purpose is to hunt down and slay mortals in order to obtain souls for her foul master to torment.
NPC.longDescription: A night hag reaches out to steal your soul.

NPC.name: stalker invisible
NPC.description: You see only a wavy distortion in the air. You reach out to touch it, and feel nothing, not even the slightest of motions.
NPC.longDescription: You see a wavy distortion in the air.

NPC.name: soulless one
NPC.description: This unfortunate being has had its very soul torn from its body. It now roams mindlessly, unaware of its surroundings.
NPC.longDescription: The soulless one wanders mindlessly.

NPC.name: githyanki hunter
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands almost as tall as a normal man. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken.
NPC.longDescription: A githyanki hunter searches for signs of the githzerai.

NPC.name: githyanki warrior
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands as tall as a normal man. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken. He is clad in ornately designed splinted armor, and wields a sword that whistles through the air as it slices towards your neck.
NPC.longDescription: You see a humanoid figure clad in splinted armor.

NPC.name: githyanki guardian
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands as tall as a normal man. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken. He is clad in ornately designed splinted armor, and wields a sword that whistles through the air as it slices towards your neck.
NPC.longDescription: A humanoid figure clad in splinted armor blocks your way.

NPC.name: githyanki knight
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands a full foot taller than a normal man. His features are obscured by a suit of ornately designed splinted armor -- you only hear the hissing of his breath and the scraping of his sword against its scabbard as it is unsheathed.
NPC.longDescription: A tall figure armored in black observes you quietly.

NPC.name: githyanki protector
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands a full foot taller than a normal man. His features are obscured by a suit of ornately designed splinted armor -- you only hear the hissing of his breath and the scraping of his sword against its scabbard as it is unsheathed.
NPC.longDescription: A black knight of the githyanki protects his queen.

NPC.name: githyanki gish
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands nearly as tall as a normal man. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken. The gish are well-versed in the arcane arts, unlike the normal gith people. You notice this from the blast of lightning headed towards you.
NPC.longDescription: A small githyanki laughs at you through fanged teeth.

NPC.name: githyanki gish
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned humanoid creature that stands nearly as tall as a normal man. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken. The gish are well-versed in the arcane arts, unlike the normal gith people. You notice this from the blast of lightning headed towards you.
NPC.longDescription: A gish laughs as flame leaps from his hands towards your face.

NPC.name: githyanki warlock
NPC.description: You see a leathery-skinned creature, clad all in black and bearing a silvery- colored sword. Like all githyanki, his teeth are fanged and his eyes hollow and sunken. As you turn to flee, you feel the impact of a fireball against your back.
NPC.longDescription: A humanoid figure stands here, holding a silvery sword.

NPC.name: githyanki lich queen
NPC.description: The lich-queen of the githyanki was once human, but no longer. Her skin has completely shrunken around her skull, held together solely by the force of unholy magic and the powers of this plane of existence. The cold glare of her hollow eyes sends you into paroxysms of fright.
NPC.longDescription: The evil lich-queen of the Gith reaches out to destroy you.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lord gith
NPC.description: Lord Gith is the dead savior of the githyanki people, the warrior who led them to freedom from their former enslavers, the mind flayers. He has been dead for centuries and stands before you now due to an unholy alliance with powers beyond mortal ken. He gestures towards you. You feel your heart tremble and your throat begin to tighten. You are about to die.
NPC.longDescription: Lord Gith suddenly forms from a cloud of blackness. He stares right through you with deadly, cold eyes.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ghost
NPC.description: The ghost makes no sound. It is a shadowy shell of its former self, cursed now to roam forever without rest. The mind of this creature has been twisted and destroyed in this torment, and it now envys and intends to destroy all the true living beings it encounters, including you.
NPC.longDescription: A ghost wanders here, intent on destroying all life.

NPC.name: githzerai prisoner
NPC.description: You see a conniving humanoid, a descendant of a race of humans once enslaved by the mindflayers and related to the githyanki. Unfortunately, the two races are bitter enemies, and this one happened to get caught. He intends to escape.
NPC.longDescription: A githzerai plots his escape plan.

NPC.name: mindflayer prisoner
NPC.description: You see a formerly tall humanoid creature, with four tentacles hanging from the middle of its head. It is hunched over, bent and scarred from torture inflicted by the githyanki. It cringes as you approach.
NPC.longDescription: A mindflayer lies here, scarred from the torture inflicted by the Gith.

NPC.name: dragon red slave
NPC.description: The mighty scaled beast has been magically bound and subdued by the residents of the keep. Nevertheless, he is still an impressive sight, some twenty feet in length with an even more massive wingspan. He watches you, smoke drifting from his open mouth.
NPC.longDescription: A giant red dragon is chained here, his breath heating the furnace.

NPC.name: fire furnace flame
NPC.description: The fire feeds on your skin like a living being, licking out at your hair.
NPC.longDescription: The fires of the furnace burn away at your skin!

Item.Name: hammer sledge grey
Item.LongDescription: The ground cracks under the weight of a grey hammer lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This massive hammer is incredibly hard, heavy, and utterly grey and featureless.

Item.Name: scroll violet
Item.LongDescription: A rolled piece of violet parchment lies on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: The scroll is written on soft violet parchment that has a pleasing smell to it.

Item.Name: tablet scroll black
Item.LongDescription: Lying on the ground is a jet black stone tablet.

ExtraDescription.Description: The tablet is an unreflective black rectangular piece of stone, with strange writings etched deep into its surface.

Item.Name: scroll githyanki
Item.ShortDescription: a scroll with githyanki writings on it
Item.LongDescription: You see a scroll written in an alien tongue.

ExtraDescription.Description: The scroll has writings on it that you cannot comprehend.

Item.Name: amulet demon
Item.LongDescription: A small amulet lies here in the dirt.

ExtraDescription.Description: The amulet is a small circular object made from some bizarre metallic alloy. It is inscribed with various symbols and raised images of snakes, tortured victims, and other things too horrible to describe. Stenciled in the center is an unpronounceable name which it would behoove you not to utter aloud.

Item.Name: talisman devilish
Item.LongDescription: On the ground is a small talisman which radiates a tangible evil.

ExtraDescription.Description: The talisman is a red circular stone object hanging from a metallic chain. It seems to pulse with a life of its own, and you feel uncomfortable being anywhere near it. Engraved in the center is one word. Merely reading the word induces fright.

Item.Name: knife silvery
Item.LongDescription: A flat-bladed silvery knife lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The knife is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have never seen in your own world. It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost fluid to the touch.

Item.Name: dagger silvery
Item.LongDescription: A sharp-looking silvery dagger lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The dagger is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have never seen in your own world. It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost fluid to the touch.

Item.Name: sword thin
Item.ShortDescription: an extremely sharp and thin sword
Item.LongDescription: Light glints off the edge of a razor-sharp sword.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal. It barely measures an inch across at its widest point, yet it is totally inflexible and razor-sharp. It could probably cut through stone.

Item.Name: sword thin two two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A heavy yet thinly bladed two-handed sword lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal. It barely measures two inches across at its widest point, yet it is totally inflexible and razor sharp. It could probably cut through stone.

Item.Name: sword silvery two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A silvery sword gleams unnaturally with an alien light.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have never seen in your own world. It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost fluid to the touch.

Item.Name: flail barbed iron
Item.LongDescription: A rusty iron flail with wicked barbs on it tears at the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: This hideous weapon has claimed many lives. You can tell from the bloodstains dried into the iron and from the residue of flesh that hangs from the many barbs on it.

Item.Name: sword gith two-handed
Item.ShortDescription: the unholy sword of the githyanki
Item.LongDescription: You feel tendrils of evil emanating from a wicked blade.

ExtraDescription.Description: The blade of this sword is a featureless gray. As you touch it you feel an evil presence reaching out to consume your soul. Maybe picking it up wasn't such a good idea.

Item.Name: stone flame
Item.LongDescription: The room is lit by a hot blue flame coming from a small stone.

ExtraDescription.Description: This stone burns with an flame that emits great heat, yet it can be held with ease. The flame creates a light that allows you to see for miles.

Item.Name: powder astral
Item.LongDescription: Twinkling powder floats before your eyes.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see the residue of the astral plane.

Item.Name: vest splint
Item.LongDescription: An intricately fashioned splint mail vest lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest quality of steels.

Item.Name: skirt splint
Item.LongDescription: An intricately fashioned splint mail skirt lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest quality of steels.

Item.Name: sleeves splint
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of splint mail sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of intricately fashioned splint mail sleeves lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest quality of steels.

Item.Name: gauntlets ornate
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of ornately designed gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A pair of painstakingly designed ornate gauntlets lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These gauntlets have been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest quality of steels.

Item.Name: vest cracked leather
Item.ShortDescription: a decaying vest made from cracked leather
Item.LongDescription: A decaying hunk of cracked leather has been discarded here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ancient vest is barely intact. All of the leather has cracked and dried to a husk. It is covered with stains, burns, scorch marks, and blood.

Item.Name: potion violet
Item.LongDescription: A tall glass flask holds a translucent violet fluid.

ExtraDescription.Description: The violet fluid inside shifts and swirls.

Item.Name: potion vial murky
Item.LongDescription: A small vial contains a murky, sludge-like substance.

ExtraDescription.Description: The murky liquid inside this vial looks a lot like sewer water.

Item.Name: potion silvery
Item.LongDescription: An octagonal vial holds a silvery-colored fluid that reflects light.

ExtraDescription.Description: The octagonal vial contains a silvery-colored liquid that shimmers in the light.

Item.Name: mint chocolate
Item.LongDescription: Someone has dropped a delicious-looking chocolate mint here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This mint is made from the finest of chocolates, surrounding a cool peppermint interior that must be savored, not swallowed.

Item.Name: pentagram
Item.LongDescription: A small black metal pentagram has been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The pentagram is a small circular hoop that surrounds a five-pointed star. Inscribed on its exterior loop are markings in an alien tongue.

Item.Name: pouch rotting
Item.LongDescription: A small pouch rots away on the floor here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You think you see glints of metal through the holes...
